resources.string:
HOW TO USE THIS?
 
 Watch a quick demo of the App:
 youtube.com/watch?v=109XuafI7C8
 

 Single tap sound source
 		–> (de)select that sound source
 Single tap background
 		–>(de)select all sound sources
 

 Double tap selected sound source
 		–>(un)mute all selected sound sources
 Double tap deselected sound source
 		–>(un)mute that sound source
 Double tap background
 		–>fit scene into screen
 

 Drag selected sound source
 		–>move all selected sound sources
 Drag deselected sound source
 		–>move that sound source
 Drag background
 		–>move viewport
 

 CONTACT
 		SoundScapeRenderer@telekom.de
 
 SoundScape Renderer:
 		tu-berlin.de/?id=ssr
 Spatial Audio Research Group:
 		audio.qu.tu-berlin.de
 Quality and Usability Lab:
 		qu.tu-berlin.de

Please make sure you have a SoundScape Renderer Server up and running in a reachable network.
 
 Enter host name/ip address and port of the server, choose the style of displaying listener orientation changes and hit connect.
 
 Watch a quick demo of the App:
 youtube.com/watch?v=109XuafI7C8
 

 Contact
 		SoundScapeRenderer@telekom.de
 
 SoundScape Renderer:
 		tu-berlin.de/?id=ssr
 Spatial Audio Research Group:
 		audio.qu.tu-berlin.de
 Quality and Usability Lab:
 		qu.tu-berlin.de
